short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds an article to pocket (http://getpocket.com). Indicates whether the current page is in Pocket

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension require an 
"Take from Pocket"
extension to be installed (https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/take-from-pocket/higpiildcmkbifobkbcmigbipabnkgkd)

1.0.3
* Fix icon rotating after click on context menu
